articles.author: Emilio Casalicchio
articles.title: US Republicans fear UK Chagos Islands deal will boost China - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Britain insisted its U.S. allies were fully behind the move to hand control of the islands – home to a secretive military base — to Mauritius.
articles.content:
The British government insisted its U.S. allies were foursquare behind the move, after a report claimed Washington raised concerns about the decision with the U.K. 
But top Republican lawmakers echo… [+1238 chars]
